body:
Summary

### Expected Result:   package builds and installs
### Actual Result: package failed to build
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ spack install py-pydf2%gcc@5.4.0^python@3.5.2+ucs4
==> Error: py-pydf2 does not depend on python
```
Other packages I needed to install, install fine...
title: Python package reports python not required
